Summary: saw a black and silver triangle floating in sky changing shapes
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving kids home from school, saw a triangle floating in the sky, showed my kids and we pulled over to try and get picture. As quick as we could pull over it was really close at first, as we got out of the car it was suddenly far away, close enough for me to get a picture.
trends: There have been 47 other sightings in Cleveland
There were 2 other sightings in Cleveland on or around May 28th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
